slide.title: Yahoo! Mobile
slide.example: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <config> <title>Hello, World!</title> <version>1.0</version> <identifier>hello-world</identifier> <description>The Hello World Widget</description> <icon>icon</icon> <author organization="Yahoo!" href="http://www.yahoo.com">Eric Lin</author> <widget base="http://dev-wmess1.mobile.re3.yahoo.com/widget/demo/1.0/example"> <preview> <icon>icon</icon> <label>Hello, World!</label> </preview> <shortcuts> <item default="true"> <label>Hello, World!</label> <href>HelloWorld.bp</href> </item> </shortcuts> </widget> </config>
